titles.title: A bill to expand the definition of immediate relative for purposes of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2360)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
2/28/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include in the definition of "immediate relative" the child of a parent of a U.S. citizen who is accompanying or following to join the immediate relative parent.
